Introduction
This topic includes information describing the impact of an ITF on assignment of effective dates, including
applicability of ITF on effective date assignment
effective date of entitlement following receipt of an ITF
, and
examples of selecting an effective date following receipt of an ITF
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Effective Dates
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
